title: Muktinath Yatra Nepal: Complete Travel Guide from India
metaTitle: Muktinath Yatra Guide | Nepal Pilgrimage Tour
metaDescription: Plan your Muktinath Yatra in Nepal with route details, best time, cost and tips. Trusted pilgrimage tours by Pashupatinath Holidays.
author: Pashupatinath Holidays

content.value: Muktinath Temple is one of the most sacred pilgrimage sites for Hindus and Buddhists, located in the Mustang region of Nepal.
How to Reach Muktinath from India
Most pilgrims travel via Gorakhpur or Kathmandu. Pashupatinath Holidays offers complete Muktinath Yatra packages including transport, hotel and darshan assistance.
The best time to visit Muktinath is from March to June and September to November for clear weather and smooth travel.
